name: @stdjs/database
description: Database Adapter with Async/Promise for Javascript(& Typescript).
author: Cris <corgidisco@gmail.com>

scripts.prepack: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.build: rimraf ./lib && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && babel src --out-dir lib --extensions ".ts" --source-maps inline
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit
